title: Veigar does way too much damage with his ult far too early in the game.
body: At the 15 minute mark i got one shot by veigar's rank 2 ult and around 250 ap. Without ludens. This is insane.

replies.body: It's impossible unless you were 6 level behind him.
so {{champion:134}} does single target burst mage better then him {{champion:63}} does AOE burst better and and every mage the Riot calls a battle mage out does him in consistent damage
Doubtful, because his ult does really bad damage against a full-hp target, it will not even 100-0 anyone when he has 1300 AP. More likely you walked into his E and got hit with Q W Ignite auto R.
yah that is why his win rate is soooo high...
